amendment.description: To require full discloser of all entities and organizations receiving Federal funds.

action.text: Amendment SA 3175 ruled out of order by the chair.
Amendment SA 3175 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S2491-2493; text: CR S2492) To require full discloser of all entities and organizations receiving Federal funds.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3175 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Coburn.
